title: Smooth and Spicy Almond Sauce
directions: Pulse ginger in a food processor until finely chopped. Add almond butter, lemon juice, honey, paprika, cayenne, and ⅓ cup ice-cold water and pulse, adding more water by the tablespoonful to thin if needed, until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.
Do Ahead: Almond sauce can be made 3 days ahead; cover and chill. Bring to room temperature before using.
ingredients: 1 ½-inch piece ginger, peeled, coarsely chopped
